short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects fake news using the AI by 01BytesAI(O.R) omerrustemi.dev

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to Use:
After installing the extension, it remains inactive until you choose to engage it. Simply click on "Analyze News" on any news article page to start the analysis process. The extension will then provide a detailed breakdown of the article's credibility without using any color coding, ensuring a straightforward and unbiased user experience.
